description: Beautiful Corner Unit townhouse centrally located at Edmonds area with 2 parking and 1 locker. Built in 2014. Close proximity to skytrain, grocery stores, restaurants, Edmonds Community centre, library and many more. This 3 level contemporary towhhome boasts stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and modern cabinetry in the kitchen, powder room and a private yard. 3 bedrooms in total, with the top level holding the large master bedroom with a vaulted ceiling. School catchment: Stride Avenue Community & Byrne Creek Secondary.
